resources.string: This app can\'t work without knowing your location. If you change your mind, please grant the authorization through the Settings panel of your device.
In order to work, this app needs to access your location. Sadly, looks like your device cannot provide this information, so the app can\'t work properly.
Looks like you are offline! Please check that your device is connected to the phone network.

If you are a travelling worker, this app is made just for you.
To start, I will ask you to specify your working schedule; only within this schedule, I will share your location with your potential customers, who will be able to see it on a map.

Do you agree?
Have a nice day at work!
From now on, your customers can view your location.
Set your working days and tap on hours to change them.
Please set your working schedule to let your customers know your location.
Should I stop sending your location?
Yes, I'll be away for a while
Yes, don't send my location anymore
What can I do for you?
I'm working with you right now: your potential customers can currently see your location.
Location detection is currently off: nobody can see your current location right now.
Congratulations! You have successfully set your working schedule.
I want to set my vacations
From now on, your customers will be able to know your location, according to your work schedule.
The service was stopped. If you want it to start again, just open the app. See you soon!
Well done: I will suspend the service during your vacation days.
I can\'t work without your permission. If you change your mind, just reopen the app. See you soon!
I\'m ready to start! From now on, I will make your location available during your working hours.
I want to set my working schedule
